articles.title: Open-Source AGI Network ‘The GRID' Debuts
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: Sentient has rolled out The GRID, an open-source network for artificial general intelligence enabling developers to build, share and monetise AI agents. It is a decentralised alternative to closed AI platforms such as OpenAI. It offers token-based monetisation and interoperability.

articles.title: NUWC Division, Keyport upskills workforce with AI, cloud training
articles.author: Frank Kaminski
articles.summary: Naval Undersea Warfare Center Division, Keyport introduced two new training sessions aimed at improving its employees' digital literacy and maximizing its investments in existing technology. The trainings cover the basics of Flank Speed, the Navy's enterprise cloud environment, and NIPRGPT, a ChatGPT-like AI chatbot developed by the U.S. Air Force and now being used within the Navy.
